headline: The Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: Due to his success -- both personally and through his company, Berkshire Hathaway -- Warren Buffett draws a lot of attention when he speaks and makes investing moves.  With Buffett's net worth of over $150 billion and Berkshire Hathaway's market cap of over $1 trillion (as of April 7), it's easy to see why.  People often look to Berkshire Hathaway's stock portfolio to get inspiration for investments they may want to consider, especially during turbulent market times like we're witnessing now.

headline: Coca-Cola Hits an All-Time High Despite Market Turmoil. Is the Dividend King a Buy Now?
summary: For the week, it was down just 0.6% compared to a 7.9% decline in the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI), a 9.1% sell-off in the S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC), and a 10% decline in the Nasdaq Composite (NASDAQINDEX: ^IXIC).  Here's why Coca-Cola is holding its ground and whether the dividend stock seems worth buying now.  This outperformance may come as a surprise given it is a global company.

headline: 3 Warren Buffett Stocks to Help Set Up Your Portfolio for 2025
summary: Warren Buffett's talent for growing piles of money lies in finding competitively positioned businesses that can weather the occasional hiccup in the economy and keep growing.  With economic uncertainty weighing on the stock market, investors can find solid stocks to buy in the portfolio of Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B).
